title: 关于Item Lore Stats的问题
author: 1469qh587910
txt_content: 不知道为什么怪物打死之后有几率掉落一些装备，好像是插件自带的，有些攻击力甚至几万，怎么把它关掉？

replies.txt_content:
可以这样修改


# Default config for ItemLoreStats. fileVersion: 421checkForUpdates: falselanguageFile: language-enusingMcMMO: falseusingBarAPI: truedropCustomILSLoot: falseILSLootFromNaturalSpawnsOnly: falseaddSellValueToDrops: truekeepXPOnDeath: trueaddRandomLore: falserandomApplyChance: 45        修改这里的掉落几率，改成0即可healthPerLevel: 2baseHealth: 20baseHealthRegen: 2baseMovementSpeed: 0.2healthScale: 20baseCritDamage: 50levelCap: 800displayDurabilityWarnings: enable75%DurabilityWarning: true  enable50%DurabilityWarning:true enable25%DurabilityWarning: true
